ToExpand.Title: computers
ToExpand.Text:
10+ years of experience with computers in general.
10+ years of experience with Microsoft Windows.
2+ years of experience with GNU/Linux.

Familiarity with technology: I've been interested in it all my life.
Can apprehend new technologies quickly and efficiently. (autodidact)

Can set up small networks.
Can solve hardware and software problems.
Can build a PC from scratch.
